sentences.en: Although she had various boyfriends, Madeleine was, and remains, fiercely self-sufficient.
sentences.cn: 尽管有过各种各样的男朋友，马德琳过去和现在一直都非常自立。

sentences.en: Alton has made himself fiercely unpopular in certain circles.
sentences.cn: 奥尔顿把自己搞得在某些圈子里极其不受欢迎。

sentences.en: At the committee meeting the experts laid into each other fiercely.
sentences.cn: 在委员会会议上,专家们互相猛烈抨击.

sentences.en: At the mere thought of him her heart began to beat fiercely.
sentences.cn: 她一想到他心就开始激烈地跳动.

sentences.en: Banks and building societies are competing fiercely for business.
sentences.cn: 银行和购房互助协会为了争夺业务而展开激烈的竞争。

sentences.en: He fiercely criticised self-styled educational experts for ignoring Shakespeare.
sentences.cn: 他强烈批评那些无视莎士比亚的自诩为教育专家的人。

sentences.en: He has always been ambitious and fiercely competitive.
sentences.cn: 他一直都雄心勃勃，而且极其好胜。

sentences.en: He knocked the tiger about fiercely until it lay dead.
sentences.cn: 他挥拳痛击老虎,直到把它打死在地.

sentences.en: The cat fought fiercely to defend its young.
sentences.cn: 那只猫拼命反抗,以保护小猫.

sentences.en: The elephant is not immediately susceptible to such blandishments, however, and usually lashes fiercely with its trunk in all directions.
sentences.cn: 然而大象不会立刻被这些讨好的话感动，而往往是用鼻子朝各个方向猛烈地甩动。

sentences.en: The Scythians were a fiercely warlike people.
They brushed aside every difficulty and pushed on fiercely.
sentences.cn: 他们不顾一切困难,向前推进.

trans.tran_cn: 凶猛地，残酷地，猛烈地，激烈地
